content: 2013 Casascius 0.5 btc 1/2toz silver ANACS MS66  SERIES 2 HOLOGRAM!!!!!!!!!!!                THIS COIN IS 1 OF 45 PRODUCED BY CASASCIUS.1Aga6L3JZKKE3j6yACCac9weaTU5K6YCyhSTARTING BID: 0.500BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 3rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: *** side note ***This is not meant to de-rail the thread, but interesting. Will delete if requested.  This is the same type Casascius coin that was attempted to be sold on the TV show Pawn Stars season 20 episode 7. It is not the literal same exact coin, just a yellow slab 0.5 silver "Error Holo" round, 1 of 45. The seller was a forum member here, Eodguy149. He made a thread about it here. The one discussed in the episode was an MS68 and he asked for for $215,000. Eodguy149 sated he picked a starting price at 10X face. BTC at the time was around $45K, so 4.5BTC. Rick countered with BTC+silver spot face value and no deal was made. I'll let you read the thread and watch the video. A very cool item, can't wait to see how it goes here, maybe Rick will show up and make an offer with his forum account since he missed out in 2021. Geo

comments.author: dazedfool
comments.body: Able to share the previous owner?
